title: The anatomie of a Christian man VVherein is plainelie shewed out of the VVord of God, what manner of man a true Christian is in all his conuersation, both inward, and outward. ... By M. William Covvper, minister of Gods Word.
author: Cowper, William, 1568-1619.
publisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] for Iohn Budge, and are to be sould at the great south dore of Paules, and at Brittaynes Bursse,
